data.title: Wild River (Widescreen) 1960 (DVD) Montgomery Clift, Lee Remick, Jo Van Fleet, Albert Salmi, Jay C. Flippen, Barbara Loden, James Westerfield, Frank Overton and Bruce Dern
data.meta_description: Wild River Widescreen 1960 DVD Montgomery Clift Lee Remick Jo Van Fleet Albert Salmi Jay C Flippen Elia Kazan directs. Idealistic TVA agent meets his match.
data.text:
Wild River DVD (Region 1 - Playable in North America - the US, Canada, Mexico, etc.) Widescreen. Color. New, lower price!

Starring: Montgomery Clift, Lee Remick, Jo Van Fleet, Albert Salmi, Jay C. Flippen, Barbara Loden, James Westerfield, Frank Overton, Bruce Dern, Malcolm Atterbury. Written by Paul Osborn based on the novels of William Bradford Huie and Borden Deal. Directed by Elia Kazan.

Set in the early 1930s and filmed on location in the Tennessee Valley, an idealistic TVA agent (Montgomery Clift) is assigned the task of convincing the locals to move from their property so that a beneficial dam can be built. One major barrier stands in his way, a feisty old woman (Jo Van Fleet) who simply refuses to budge from her land. A masterful recreation of a troubled and complex period in American history is marked not only by its astounding locations, its first-rate performances, but by its forward-thinking and undeniably powerful social impact. A quiet and moving classic.

"The Wild Language...The Wild Hungers...The Wild Furies! As surely as the river rises, it had to happen..."
